menuItems.title: Dancing Salmon
menuItems.content: Fresh Atlantic salmon, cucumber, avocado, topped with seared salmon, jalapeño, and our house spicy mayo.

menuItems.title: Harvest Roll
menuItems.content: Tempura sweet potato, cream cheese, and cucumber topped with avocado and a drizzle of teriyaki glaze.

menuItems.title: Hamachi Karma
menuItems.content: Yellowtail, jalapeño, and ponzu sauce. Clean, bright, and beautifully simple.

menuItems.title: Duck Curry
menuItems.content: Roasted duck breast in red coconut curry with lychee, pineapple, tomatoes, and Thai basil. Served with jasmine rice.

menuItems.title: Mango Tango
menuItems.content: Crispy tofu or shrimp tossed in a house mango sauce with bell peppers, snap peas, and Thai basil. Served with jasmine rice.

menuItems.title: Chashu Don
menuItems.content: Slow-braised pork belly over steamed rice with soft-boiled egg, pickled ginger, nori, and house tare.

menuItems.title: Unagi Don
menuItems.content: Grilled freshwater eel over steamed rice with house unagi sauce, sesame, and cucumber.

menuItems.title: Bento Box
menuItems.content: Your choice of protein with miso soup, house salad, steamed rice, gyoza, and seasonal vegetable. Ask your server for today's protein selections.

menuItems.title: Tom Yum Ramen
menuItems.content: House-made broth blending Thai tom yum with Japanese tonkotsu. Topped with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and soft-boiled egg.
